name: Byzantine: The Betrayal
summary:
Byzantine: The Betrayal is a first-person adventure game in which the player takes the role of an American journalist, summoned to the city of Istanbul by an old college friend with the promise of a once in a lifetime story. By the time the player arrives police are already on the scene, his old friend, Emre, has run away. Players must use their investigative skills in order to uncover the secret he struggled, but failed, to reveal. Failure could mean death.

The game plays in a typical first-person adventure fashion, providing 360º of freedom of movement around the player, as well as the ability to look up and down. Locations are presented as static images and talking is handled similar to that in the Tex Murphy series, with live cast and photo realistic surroundings. The game incorporates details of Turkey's history, as well as that of Southeastern Europe and so the player will have to make use of an abnormal piece of technology to investigate through the past and save yourself in the present, uncovering the secrets that lie behind Emre's disappearance.

name: Bye-Bye, Wacky Planet
summary:
A fast-paced 2D side-scrolling shooter inspired by the old school video games. Use a wide selection of alien guns to tear through a bunch of enemies to freedom! 
 
You play as Alan and Eve, two adorable aliens that ended up on the planet Earth in the hands of terrible scientists. Help them to escape and to go back to their home planet!

name: By Fire & Sword
summary: Set in the 1600s, Fire and the Sword brings the medieval Mount and Blade games into an era of new technology and conflicts, while retaining its open world RPG gameplay.

name: Bye-Bye Boxboy!
summary:
Wait…a box is the last defense against annihilation?!

Well, fear not—Qbby is no ordinary box. Using his four startling new powers, you must solve hundreds of puzzles across 18 deadly worlds. Create boxes to climb, hover, warp, and bomb your way to salvation! Whether you're a newcomer or an old vet, thinking outside the box has never been more fun.

Scattered across many challenging worlds, Black Smoke and other new hazards threaten to destroy Qbby. Survive vicious winds, viscous water, and more on your mission to rescue the mysteriously cute little wonders known as Qbabies. Each Qbaby you rescue will offer a new power: hit high buttons with a Boxrocket, destroy parts of the environment with a Bombox, teleport with a Warpbox, and even levitate a Remotebox. To the victor goes the goodies: earn new in-game costumes, comics, music, and challenge worlds by beating levels or tapping amiibo. Tap a Kirby series amiibo figure to receive a costume based on the tapped character! King Dedede box, anyone?

Create boxes and unleash four new box powers to solve new puzzles
Journey across 18 worlds of puzzling stages with unexpected new hazards
Earn new costumes, comics, music, challenge worlds, and more!
The new challenge worlds are unlike anything in the series so far
SAVE THE QBABIES!!!

name: Bypassed
summary: Bypassed is a simplistic arcade game – with simple control and increasingly challenging gameplay. You keep track of the incoming cars and their destinations. Each vehicle needs to be directed to the matching track, depending on its distinct colour.

name: Byte Family
summary:
Overcome obstacles and restore the cyber world ByteFamily, eliminating the system virus, unlocking new game modes and gaining new skills!
The cyber world ByteFamily was invaded by thousands of viruses that are affecting the entire system. The person in charge of all this is a bit familiar stranger, call: Ermes Boss.Save the system by Pixel, the antivirus bit. And stop plans Ermes Boss.

name: Bygone
summary:
An innovative and fun platform game. 
 
The player controls a small blue Slinky robot, jumping while adhering and moving through a series of natural platforms levels and must eliminate different kinds of enemy creatures and catch special robotics parts to become different types of robot, always with the possibility once transformed of returning it to its bygone form and try different combinations of transformation, to reach higher zones and defeat the boss, a stone monster that must be shoot several times in his eye without touch it, to go to next levels.

name: Byouin Sodom
summary: A visual novel from Portion.

name: Bygg Bilar med Mulle Meck
summary: You are playing as Mulle Meck. And your mission is to build cars from various parts and junk that you find and drive through the town and help the townsfolk along the way.

name: By Any Means Necessary
summary: Follow Captain Yusef and his team on their quest to find the source of the monster spawning portal in this turn-based 2D rpg.

name: Bygone Worlds: Jerusalem
summary: You are in Jerusalem at the time of Jesus Christ, and this application will narrate your path as you explore and interact with this incredible city. You will see the sights, hear the sounds and complete a short journey of daily life.

name: Bygone Worlds: Ephesus
summary: 2,000 years ago, Ephesus served as a lively centre of trade, connecting the cultures of Europe and Asia Minor. Sail on ancient seas, explore unknown worlds, and witness one of the world’s most important ancient sites. Experience it now!

name: Bystander
summary:
Bystander is an opportunity to become an agent for tracking the network during totalitarianism.
Your task is to search among other people's correspondence on the network those that contradict the current laws, copies of which you will receive by fax.
Follow the new laws, look for the hidden meaning in each phrase and, of course, report violations, to the glory of the great Arstotska!

name: Bygone Worlds: Drama at the Odeion
summary: The Odeion of Agrippa was one of the most significant venues ever built, home to many of the greatest performances in history. Climb up onto the stage and try to win the hearts of the people of Athens.

name: Bytepath
summary: Bytepath is a replayable arcade shooter with a focus on build theorycrafting. Use a massive skill tree, many classes and ships to create your own builds and defeat an ever increasing amount of enemies.

name: Bygg Båtar med Mulle Meck
summary: Mulle Meck builds ships in this second installment of Gary Gadget series.

name: Bygg Flygplan med Mulle Meck
summary: The player gets to know that Mulle Meck has found the abandoned hangar of two air planes constructors and wants to try that trade. Again he receives his parts from Doris Digital. Gary flies to visit his friends and like in the previous episodes he gets orders which the player must complete.

name: Bygg Hus med Mulle Meck
summary: Mulle Meck finds his house in debris after a storm caused a tree to fall on it. He promptly starts to build houses. In this instance you can travel around the game map via both car and boat.

name: Byte Chaser
summary: In the year 2025, Agein Han is trapped in a virutual world. She must find enough bytes to unlock the backdoor out.

name: Byte Driver
summary: Byte Driver combines a classic driving game with a bottom up shooter. Your car runs on energy. Using weapons and bumping into things will cost you energy. Energy and weapons are obtained by hacking the vehicles around you. You’ll have to stay alert, because the sharply twisting road and countless enemy vehicles will be trying to stop you from reaching your ultimate goal. Run out of energy, and you die.

name: By Moonlight
summary: ~ ~ A Comedic Mystery Visual Novel with Relationship Building ~ ~ Play as a paranormal investigator hired by the paranormal to investigate! Search for a headless horseman's missing head before the night is over.

name: By Your Side
summary: A short simulation game made by one person in one month.

name: By Lamplight
summary: By Lamplight is a turn-based dungeon crawler where you must climb to the 13th floor of the Demonic Spire. As you climb, you must manage the oil supply for your lantern as well as your own health and sanity. Lighting Torches can help stave off the grip of insanity but will cost you some of your ever-dwindling supply of oil. Will you conserve oil to keep your lantern lit or will you save your sanity and attempt to ward off the horrors of the spire?

name: Byod
summary: You are starting your IT internship. The details you got from the university are scarce: just the address and the date (today).

name: Byakko-tai Samurai Boys
summary: The main character Shikame Chisato and her elder brother who went to a Hanko Nisshinkan School as a swordplay instructor surrogate. Hers childhood friend, Minoji Sakai also, he went to there, where women are usually not allowed to attend, he was worried about Chisato going … And an encounter with the boys（Gisaburo Shinoda,Matahachi Ito） who go to Nisshinkan School , Towako Yamamoto who goes to as a gunnery instructor surrogate likewise, the youth Kotaro Saitani who has a store Nishikiya in a castle town, and the mysterious youth Narihira Agatuma who lives there as a guest staying changes the respective destiny big.

name: Bygone Dreams
summary: Bygone Dreams is a high fantasy Action-Adventure set inside a surreal dream world. Face fantastical adversaries, solve puzzles, and fight your way through challenging bosses in your quest to save the world's matron deity and stop the nightmare consuming the dream.

name: B.Y.O.O.L.: Best Years of Our Lives
summary: A visual novel about love, full of odd humor, dark humor, meta humor and hopefully, heart. Join Nastya Byool as she goes on a dark, surreal adventure that will change her life forever. This kinetic novel will take you about 40 minutes, making it a good way to pass the time if you're short on it.

name: By God Your Anger is Beautiful
summary: FEVER FEAsT FOLLOW-THRU to mantras for breakfast., it's fuck you for lunch

name: By Day and Night
summary: A short game designed to help the player recognize the stages of grief and provide a story in the process. You will play as Clara, a young woman who has lost both of her parents. You'll help her start a long awaited journey and meet characters who need her help to cope with their past.

name: Bylista: Vasna
summary: Move through the forest and meet mystical and magical creatures. Make a choice and go to your goal.

name: Byte the Bullet
summary: Get into my infected computer and restore every virus-ridden system by recovering game attributes like color or save functions. Enjoy this parody of multiple classic games from 80s & 90s.

name: Byte Lynx
summary: Byte Lynx is a sci-fi real-time strategy game with construction-based combat set in the X-736 solar system. Out-maneuver your opponent and make their base your own. Build powerful assault platforms to lay waste to fortified defenses.

name: Byte Cats
summary: A highly challenging action game. Control three cats to clear stages with numerous gimmicks awaiting you!

name: By the Pier
summary: A simple fishing game for the Playdate

name: By the Vine
summary: By the Vine is a Christian-based Visual Novel. The story follows a young adult named Calum, who has to live on his best friend's farm after burning down his house. What hijinks will ensue as Calum adjust to his new life on the farm?

name: By the World's Wind
summary: Set sail across a small, open world. Visit island communities, explore lost caves, and meet the local wildlife with the four winds at your back. Use the map-making tools to plot a course or simply let the wind carry you where it will.

name: Byzantine Perspective
summary: Your task is simple enough. Just nab the chalice.

name: Bytebond
summary: Unique take on co-op games genre where players set out on a fascinating journey through the world of a computer using an asymmetrical core gameplay mechanic about managing energy.

name: Byte Fyte: Multiplayer
summary: Byte Fyte: Multiplayer is a highly advanced third-person multiplayer RPG survival game, packed with tons of game features !

name: Byte Rider
summary: Introducing a dystopian, cyberpunk future of brave data-hackers, breakneck excitement, and breathtaking graphics…. Welcome to Byte Rider! Dodge and his sister Weave have hacked their way into a honeypot of data that threatens to be their last! Only you can save them from gun-toting hover-drones, vicious vehicles, and the surreal streets of Cyber City. Blaze your byte-cycle through a maze of madness, collect your data, and hack your way through this mind-bending adventure!

name: ByLo
summary: You wake up once again, but something has changed this time… Something is different… But everyone else is doing the same thing over and over again, just like they always do… You drift further and further into insanity with every action but you must escape… Don't go insane...

name: Bye Bye Swingby
summary: 'Bye Bye Swingby' is a fresh and unique simulation game that tells a sad story of escaping a destroyed Earth and exploring a new world. Take a rocket into space and use the gravity of the stars to travel to new worlds in Swingby.

name: Bytes: The Reverse Tower Defense
summary: Bytes: The Reverse Tower Defense is a twist on the classic Tower Defense formula. Build your own path to the exit and use special tiles to keep your Bytes safe against a dynamic AI that tries to counter your actions.

name: Byakuya Museum
summary: “I should have...died...”Opened eyes again, he found himself in a bustling museum!Players need to take on the role of a raven specimen boy "Gregorio" to explore the Byakuya Museum. Your mission is to plumb the secrets of Time Town, uncover your own past, and escape from the museum.

name: Bye Sweet Carole
summary: Bye Sweet Carole is a horrific thriller game inspired by the greatest animation movies and created by Chris Darril. (Remothered series) Be ready to jump into the world of Corolla and meet the rabbits that has infested it.

name: Bytesize
summary: 12 small maps, each limited to 100 linedefs.

name: Byle
summary: Fight through a corrupted city, battling over 50 unique enemies and powerful bosses. Arm yourself with an arsenal of weapons and uncover mysterious power-ups as you strive to liberate the city from the clutches of the mind-altering BYLE.

name: Byoutai Seiri DS: Image Dekiru! Shikkan, Shoujou to Care
ByteBurst
summary: Welcome to the cutting edge of virtual mayhem in "ByteBurst" - the ultimate hacker's playground. Immerse yourself in a thrilling journey through the digital realm, where your skills will be pushed to the limit, and every line of code is a potential weapon.

name: Bytebond
summary: Bond with your friend and become a part of the Antivirus Special Forces as you head to the heart of the PC. Solve electrifying puzzles to regain control over the infected CPU.

name: Byakuya Monogatari: Winchester-ke no Matsuei
summary: A visual novel released in 1988.

name: Byte Hack
summary: ByteHack is a puzzle platformer where you play as an agent from the hip new anti-malware software, Morton. Fight against the infected GPU system as the computer slowly gets more and more destroyed.

name: Byte Breach
summary: Embark on a chilling sci-fi co-op survival horror in a dystopian future ruled by AI corporations. Navigate through real and digital domains, filled with dark secrets and sinister entities. Utilize stealth, strategy, and teamwork to survive intense, unpredictable challenges. Will you outsmart the AI?

name: Bylina: Lure of the Sorceress
summary: Gather your party, and venture forth to the Kholodny Bay! Explore the wide open wilderness and dozens of dastardly dungeon levels, face hundreds of different monsters inspired by slavic mythology, and have fun storming the castle of the evil Sorceress!

name: Byte
summary: Byte is a tactics RPG that adapts the classic novel Dracula. You play as Jonathan Harker, Dracula’s real estate agent, completing work tasks while exploring the castle, speaking with its inhabitants, and hacking into computers.

name: Byte Survivor
summary: Enter the world of gaming and earn! Earn a living through a game that mines cryptocurrency, acquire new PCs and avatars, and obtain better rewards. It is a top-down, roguelike action game.

name: Byflvgvr
summary: Armed with one of those Electric Fly Zappers, Protect your delicious food from nasty and hungry bugs. Survive long enough and kill enough bugs to move onto the next level. Your bug zapper uses a LOT of ELECTRICITY; so be sure to pick up lighting bolts to recharge your zapper.

name: By Grit Alone
summary:
Stranded. Tormented. Alone.
By Grit Alone is an action horror shooter combining frantic combat, bosses and challenges with a harrowing sci-fi anthology story.

You’re marooned in a bizarre unknown dimension of space, filled with ancient derelicts and ravenous aliens. Uncover the mysteries of the dead as you move ship to ship, slaughtering your way through hordes of brain starved horrors.

Fight. Discover. Survive.
Experience twisted stories from our incredible writers, with credits including Dead Space, Resident Evil and Dr Who. There's no loading screens, no inventory and unlimited ammo; you’ll need skill and focus to rip through the ferocious swarms and get out of this corrupted hellhole in one piece.

By Grit Alone, you will survive.

name: Bythzkel-Sombréa
summary: Once you enter your commands via your game please note that its a benchmark test to test your gtx watches. Bythzkel Is an action adventure for the first person who will have to thwart the plans of the infesters precisely to counter the disease.

name: Byte Breakers
summary: Byte Breakers is a platform fighting battle royale for 40 players. Navigate a massive city, gear up, and escape the encroaching glitch zone while battling the world to become the last duo standing.

name: Byterage
summary: Byterage: Epic Battle Against the Quantum Legion Byteplex City is under the occupation of the Quantum Legion. The only hope is Steel X, fighting with his katana. Defeat enemies with fast and fluid combat. Slow down time to dodge bullets and prove your skills in this challenging experience.

name: Bylina
summary: Embark on an epic journey to the Far Far Kingdom and challenge Koschei the Deathless to save your immortal soul and become a true hero in Bylina, an Action RPG rooted in Slavic folklore and myths. Take on the role of Falconet, a young bogatyr born without hero's powers, shunned and underestimated by almost everyone. Conquer numerous ordeals, overcome insurmountable odds, and become a legendary hero whose tales will be told for ages to come.

name: Byter
summary: Byter is a Pac-Man clone. You control a mouse, moving about a maze and attempting to eat all the dots while avoiding monsters. If you touch a monster then you lose one of three lives but if you collect one of four dollar signs then you can eat the monsters for a short time.

name: Byte The Dust
summary: Make your way through increasingly harder platform sections. But be aware, one small error and it's back to the beginning for you!

name: Bygg båtar med Mulle Meck: Specialversion
summary:
This port is a customised version of the original sponsored by the Swedish company Hemglass.

Some items are already available, and the whole map is discovered from the beginning. As such the the pieces gotten from certain quests will be missing due to this. The compass part is missing and makes some areas compleletly inaccessible. A new icecream kiosk is added which is Hemglass branded.

Any extra downloadable content that was available form the developer's homepage do not work in this version.

name: Bye!Den, Go!
summary: A satirical 2D platformer in the spirit of the classic physics-based puzzle game QWOP. Help President Den finish his tasks, getting caught in absurd situations and making decisions that lead the country to chaos. A unique blend of humor and absurdity awaits you in every mission!

name: Bye!Den, Go!: Last Christmas
summary: A holiday DLC for Bye!Den, GO! Send President Den off in a festive atmosphere during his last Christmas, facing absurd tasks amidst holiday lights and winter warmth!

name: Byakko: Shijin Butai Enrenki
summary:
It is the first year of the Genji era. A period of disorder that led to the downfall of the Edo shogunate.

The protagonist, born in the Aizu provincial family of samurai, lost her elder brother to war, and became orphaned at the age of sixteen.

Engulfed in sadness, she fell asleep one night whilst hugging the blade her brother disemboweled himself with.

Suddenly, a deity calling itself Byakko appeared in her dreams—

Byakko informed her that Aizu will eventually lose the war, and bestowed upon her a single mission:

"With this gun, please prevent the 'Tragedy of the Youth' from ever taking place.
If you are able to accomplish this, I shall grant any wish of yours on the following dawn."

When she awoke, her brother's blade had changed into a gun—

Three years later, the protagonist, who had become an expert in artillery, was led to meet with her comrades-in-arms, whom she will share her fate with.

Will the ending they reach be one of tragedy, glory, or perhaps...

—This is a story of the fight against a tragic history.

name: Byte Master
summary: Are you waiting in a queue? In the subway, plane, bus, taxi? Wherever you are – Kill boredom with BYTE MASTER! A fresh combination of puzzle, idle and incremental mechanics!

name: ByteRogue
summary: ByteRogue is a minimalist tactical roguelike where you play as a wizard-thief. Use spells to outsmart security robots, manipulate the environment, and steal as much treasure as you can in each daring heist.

name: Byte of the Dead
summary: This is a bite sized zombie apocalypse game. Fight hordes of zombies while rescuing survivors. Construct a base, unlock powerful weapons and create useful items to help you survive.

name: Bytecollector
summary: Bytecollector is a short, incremental game where you draw loops to collect bytes. Spend them on a skill tree with over 40 upgrades to unlock new mechanics.

name: Byte Wars
summary: Byte Wars is a strategic top-down rocket shooter where every shot counts. Take control of a spacecraft, rotate to aim, and launch a single rocket at a time, carefully navigating the pull of nearby planets that warp your trajectory in real time.

name: Bye-Bye Bindings!
summary: Bye-Bye Bindings! is a stress-relief clicker game where you cut through invisible "En"—spiritual ties—together with a cute spirit cat. Feeling a little worn out? Put on your favorite BGM and gently reset your mind.

name: Bygone Snow
summary:
When the world ends, who will you spend your final hours with?

A short story (around an hour) about two people and their relationship as their time comes to an end.

name: By Bait or By Bullet
summary: By Bait or By Bullet is a bombastic 2D fishing rogue-lite adventure with both story-rich top-down exploration and action-packed platforming combat, made with Unity and available on Windows and through WebGL!

name: Byteworld
summary: Welcome to BYTEWORLD, the ultimate VR experience that aims to bring streamers and viewers together like never before!

name: Byte & Brew
summary: Byte & Brew is an upcoming dystopian exploration game about making coffee, learning about your customers, the city, and influencing it through your actions.

name: Bypass
summary: For all videogame fans, who have been looking for a multiplayer horror game with realistic graphics, Bypass is game which combines horror and action genre and compared to it's rivals, Bypass is free to play.

name: Byouki na Generation: Crane Catcher no Bourei
Bye Bye! Police!
summary: Steal, Escape, and Power Up! "Bye Bye! Police!" is a high-octane, first-person heist action game set in a stylized world. Evade the police blockade, cash in your loot, and upgrade your abilities. Master various skills to pull off the ultimate, "smooth" robbery!
